title: [Large-scale] Blended Teaching Method Design and Operation for Emergency Online Education Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and practical experience in social sector operations
context.additional_context: Hybrid environment using real-time video conferencing tools (Zoom) and LMS simultaneously. Requires flexible learning schedules considering learners' work commitments

learning_goals: Learners can design classes utilizing at least three synchronous instructional methods in emergency online settings
Learners can collect and analyze materials required for social problem-solving projects through asynchronous learning activities
Learners can complete project-based assessment tasks with peers using digital collaboration tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
